  • Classes in com.jme.material used by com.jme.asset 
    Class Description
    Material
    Material describes the rendering style for a given Geometry.
  • Classes in com.jme.material used by com.jme.font 
    Class Description
    Material
    Material describes the rendering style for a given Geometry.
  • Classes in com.jme.material used by com.jme.material 
    Class Description
    Material
    Material describes the rendering style for a given Geometry.
    MaterialDef
    Describes a J3MD (Material definition).
    MatParam
    Describes a material parameter.
    MatParamTexture  
    RenderState
    RenderState specifies material rendering properties that cannot be controlled by a shader on a Material.
    RenderState.BlendEquation
    BlendEquation specifies the blending equation to combine pixels.
    RenderState.BlendEquationAlpha
    BlendEquationAlpha specifies the blending equation to combine pixels for the alpha component.
    RenderState.BlendFunc
    BlendFunc defines the blending functions for use with BlendMode.Custom.
    RenderState.BlendMode
    BlendMode specifies the blending operation to use.
    RenderState.FaceCullMode
    FaceCullMode specifies the criteria for faces to be culled.
    RenderState.StencilOperation
    StencilOperation specifies the stencil operation to use in a certain scenario as specified in RenderState.setStencil(boolean, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.StencilOperation, com.jme.material.RenderState.TestFunction, com.jme.material.RenderState.TestFunction)
    RenderState.TestFunction
    TestFunction specifies the testing function for stencil test function.
    ShaderGenerationInfo
    this class is basically a struct that contains the ShaderNodes informations in an appropriate way to ease the shader generation process and make it faster.
    Technique
    Represents a technique instance.
    TechniqueDef
    Describes a technique definition.
    TechniqueDef.LightMode
    Describes light rendering mode.
    TechniqueDef.LightSpace
    Define in what space the light data should be sent to the shader.
    TechniqueDef.ShadowMode  
  • Classes in com.jme.material used by com.jme.material.logic

    Class Description
    Material
    Material describes the rendering style for a given Geometry.
    MatParamOverride
    MatParamOverride is a mechanism by which material parameters can be overridden on the scene graph.
    RenderState
    RenderState specifies material rendering properties that cannot be controlled by a shader on a Material.
    RenderState.BlendEquation
    BlendEquation specifies the blending equation to combine pixels.

    RenderState.FaceCullMode
    FaceCullMode specifies the criteria for faces to be culled.

    TestFunction specifies the testing function for stencil test function.
